QuestData.Title: The Egg Thieves
QuestData.Description: The Bloodclaw are sadistic creatures. They have attacked the Ravenskar before and have stolen the eggs of the sacred ravens.$b$bWhile you are within the Bloodclaw lands keep an eye out for the eggs.$b$bI'll be waiting for you at the nest with as many baskets for them as I can gather.
QuestData.CompletionText: Were you able to find the stolen raven eggs?
QuestData.RewardText: These poor ravens have avoided a horrible future in the Bloodclaw lands.$b$bWe will take far better care of them.$b$bThank you!
